author: Christian Durrett
comment: I like the app all around, my only concern is Everytime I try to add or edit an event through my watch it says failed. Always. I've rrsest my phone and watch and unistalled on both devices and reinstalled. Sadly still doesn't work properly

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Christian, please contact support@appfour.com for help.

author: Levi Michalski
comment: Great for making events and being reminded straight from my watch. You don't even need your phone, which is awesome. It's also very snappy and efficient.

author: Ken Weise
comment: This is a very good app. Unlike the system app, I can see my calendar for multiple days even when the phone is disconnected. I would like to see different colors for the different calendars.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content:
Please let us know exactly what you are missing in the description. 
Quote from Play Store:The full version (in-app purchase) offers:
- Add, edit and delete events
- 3 configurable calendar layouts: days per row (1,2,3,4,7) and events per day (2-9)
- Configurable colors for events, holidays, birthdays and more
- Configurable pre-defined event texts

comment: Location map doesn't work. Tapping the map tries to navigate to 0 degrees latitude, 0 degrees longitude, which is in the middle of the Atlantic Ocean.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please send your bug report to support@appfour.com, we would like to investigate! Thank you.

author: Ja Kub
comment: Cannot show whole month on one screen without personal info only calendar, complicated micro payments options, should be one price for all.

author: Shelia W
comment: can't edit calendar from watch

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Hi Sheila, please contact our support via support@appfour.com.

author: Apel Mad
comment: Great

author: Ashley Glover
comment: Not being able to sync my other calenders from other email accounts I unfortunately can't recommend this app. You cannot view all your Calendars in one place you have to choose account then view the calendar. Just seems backwards.
Buyed , and a bit disappointed , no way to add an event offline , and sync later , and alarm before event , doesen't work ,  other things are perfect .

author: Mikeflys ‡
comment: Few small issues but best calendar for my Huawei2 watch.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Please let us know what you think needs to be improved. You can send your suggestions to support@appfour.com.

author: Vegas Steve
comment: Finally got something that works with my Calendar (unlike the stock agenda).  Glad to support the dev for a useful app.

author: Michael Luchinsky
comment: Love the design, one thing is missing. Support for crown on watches like LG Sport.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you very much for your feedback.

author: James Scherber
comment: After app reinstall and rebooting watches is now working perfectly.  Very recommended.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content:
Edit: Thank you very much for the feedback, we are happy to hear everything is working now. Feel free to contact us any time if you have any further questions, suggestions or feedback. Please also consider giving us more than one star if you are happy with the app. We appreciate you support.

Old:Please contact support@appfour.com for assistance.

author: Joseph DeVenuti
comment: Unlike mail app no add accounts available. My calender is exchange.

author: Vamsikrishna Narra
comment: I like it
stupid idea

author: Mister Junky
comment: Excellent

author: Robert Dragoun
comment: I refuse to pay for an option to change first day of the week!
Best calendar for smartwatch is over here

author: Johnny Lipovac
comment: Cool

author: Matthew Connell
comment: Great app to transfer calendar events but a bit fiddly on the watch interface. I think I'm being a bit overly critical though as where it is such a small screen most things will be fiddly to a certain extent. Pleased though and I would recommend.

author: VystreloK
comment: If you don't buy the full version you will get notifications constantly to upgrade. Full version does work great, probably the best you can get for wear.

author: Colton Bercier
comment: Love the app. Exactly what I was looking for. My only critique is that deleting events from the calendar (with the full-version) is very unclear. In fact, I still can't figure out how. Not sure if it's a glitch or simply inaccessible.

author: Zayd Shaikh
comment: Nice to view your whole calendar but adding/editing/removing events doesn't work. So not worth buying at all

author: Justin Fahringer
comment: Immediately uninstalled the app after receiving ad notification that cannot be turned off without purchasing the "upgraded" version. Regardless of how good this app could have been, forced ads ruin it.

author: JOEL Schuler
comment: Can not seem to get the app to download to my Moto 360, always waiting to download or for WiFi

author: Brandon Kalinowski
comment: It is trying to do too much. This app is too complicated that it is only OK in each area. I love the functionality to add events but the calendar view is unreadable, where you can only see the first three characters of an event.

author: Janis Froehlig
comment: Free version is crippleware if you've got more than two calendars, so for me it's not even enough to test the app.  Layouts seem clever/useful, but clearly for really basic calendar use.  Calendar switching is buried, and whether one is 'on' or 'off' is truncated text on the watch.  All in all: cocky and agressive.  I know development is hard, I do it, but most free versions are at least useable somehow, or for some time, without a full page ad popping up for an entire suite of apps... on every single feature that's not a default.  In my experience, this isn't a characteristic that changes readily.  I'll come back in a month or so, but for now I'm uninstalling.

author: Ron Lees
comment: Having commented that the date format in 1 day list view was always short form US format ( mm/dd/yyyy) and therefore confusing outside US, Appfour responded within 48 hours and dates are now configurable! Thanks and well done.

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you very much for the feedback, we will look into it.

author: Scorpion King
comment: Love it

author: Kacey Blacklight
comment: Great app that lets you view, edit and add events to your calendar. Wished it would be selectable for Android Wear agenda, so that the app shows today's event when asking over Google now

author: George Enever
comment: Very handy app well done.

author: Garret Hamann
comment: Wow

author: Ulf Östling
comment: Who thought it would be a good idea to make the swipe-in menu from below on a stupid timer than just making it user interactive?! And this wear app never syncs unless you have bluetooth, never "adds" an account. Uninstalled for waste of time.

author: Viktor Kongskov
comment: The perfect wear calendar! Not a single thing missing. And now there's finally week number aswell!

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for your feedback, Viktor.

author: Francis Pham
comment: Very useful.

author: Nunya Fukin Bizzness
comment: Over Sized Apps & GREEDY DEV!

author: Jeff Rulifson
comment: 5 stars if it also showed Google Tasks

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thanks for the feedback and suggestion, we will consider it.

author: Tiberiu Toth
comment: I love it :)

author: Martin Martinson
comment: Very functional.  PLEASE TWEAK YOUR APP WHEREBY I COULD WRITE AND SAVE EVENTS IN MY WATCH WITHOUT NEED PHONE SYNC.   AND PLEASE WRITE AN APPLICATION CALLED "NOTES" WHEREBY I COULD MAKE ALL NOTES BY KEYBOARD (without need phone sync) AND SAVE IT ON MY SMARTWATCH.
